user_query: I'm organizing a real estate seminar in California and I need data on schools, agents, and properties in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and San Diego.

TaskList.description: Collect data on top-rated elementary, middle, and high schools in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and San Diego.
Gather information on real estate agents in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and San Diego, including their contact information.
Compile a list of properties for sale in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and San Diego, detailing price, square footage, and photos.

dependencies.dependency_description: Steps 1, 2, and 3 can be executed in parallel, but the overall data collection is necessary for the seminar.
